short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pokemon Sun and Moon wallpaper turn new tab to Pokemon Sun and Moon background. Pokemon Sun and Moon background theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a fresh Pokemon Sun and Moon wallpaper with every new tab.
2. Choose a random Pokemon Sun and Moon background or favorite specific ones in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Google-powered search bar for quick browsing.
4. One-click access to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Built-in notes feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Fast access to your most-visited websites.
8. Seamless access to your saved bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for instant access.
10. Direct access to Google apps.
11. Explore more themes with a quick click.
12. Simple sharing options to social media.
13. Easily download wallpapers for personal use.
14. Quick access to online games.
15. Activate fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in your Pokemon Sun and Moon new tab.
